node.title: East Cape residents warned to be prepared ahead of possible flooding
node.description: The head of Gisborne's civil defence has warned residents near East Cape to prepare to be cut off by flooding next week.
node.content:
["The head of Gisborne's civil defence has warned residents near East Cape to prepare to be cut off by flooding next week.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Rebekah Parsons-King\n
", "The MetService says a low system moving over the east coast of the North Island from Monday could bring significant rainfall.", "Tair\u0101whiti Civil Defence emergency manager Ben Green said he has warned residents living in the East Cape area to prepare to be cut off by the deluge.", "He said locals will be stocking up on supplies this weekend in case flooding closes roads.", "Green said it was unclear what impact it would have, but locals have been alerted.", "He said the east coast could see anywhere from 200 to 400mm of rain in just a few days.", "East Cape Road, which connects the area to Te Araroa, was closed for three weeks after heavy rainfall last month and it triggered several significant slips."]
